special_text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may activate one of Tsunayoshi’s loyalty abilities. This ability triggers only once each turn.
[+1]: Put a +1/+1 on up to one target creature. It gains lifelink until end of turn.
[0]: Create a 1/1 red Warrior creature token with prowess.
[-8]: Creatures you control gain flying and double strike until end of turn.
